participant_1.background:
I'm doing my best to stay positive and make the most of my time in school, but I miss being a kid sometimes.
I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment while listening to the Rolling Stones.
its great fun.
I feel closer to some of my family members than others.
i am six feet tall.

participant_2.background:
I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband.
my mother worked for apple.
I am not out to my family and I am worried about their acceptance.
i drive a bmw.
my favorite outfit is thigh high leather boots and a skirt.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you! Just hanging out and studying for my exams. What about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm just getting ready to go to comic con with my husband.
That sounds fun! I've never been to comic con before.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely go sometime.
I might have to check it out. I've always been a big fan of comics.
Me too! I love dressing up in costumes and going to cons. It's a lot of fun to meet other people who are into the same things you are.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have a good time doing that.
Thanks! I hope you get to go to a con sometime soon.
Me too! Maybe I'll see you at one someday!
Maybe! It would be great to meet you.
